Text: 5 giga out!  amazing like always, could you please also rip last half of darkness society of the serpent moon

This didn't work for me, I did as described, first used the installer, then the unpack bat, but output folder is only 2.04 gig & when I go to launch the game, I get a notice that I need to insert the CD/DVD, gansuk what have I done wrong, was the final extraction somewhere other than the first extract folder?

Ok, figured out my problem; Norton 360 v5 snagged the paul.dll as a virus & didn't alert me about it, now the AV is off I've gone through the process again this time RARed the paul.dll for safe keeping, game works well, will seed this torrent, Thanks for the upload gansuk. Cheers.
